SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AssetSetter
Sets objects on the map
CollisionChecker
Checks collision between entities, tiles, and objects
Entity
Generic class that abstracts the characteristics of a moving entity on the map
GamePanel
Sets the screen and tile dimensions, FPS.
GamePanel.gameState
 
Guard
Contains behavior of a guard the chases the player
GuardManager
Stores guards and controls their movement and state
KeyHandler
Handles keyboard inputs for movement (WASD)
OBJ_Battery
Battery object containing a score, image, and name
OBJ_Door
Door object containing a name and image
OBJ_EMP
EMP object containing a name, image, and score
OBJ_Exit
Exit object containing a name and image.
OBJ_Keycard
Keycard object containing a name, image and score
ObjectSpawner
Handles objects that spawn and despawn periodically
Player
Manages the movement, visualization, and items held by the player character.
SuperObject
Holds abstract object data and draw method
Tile
Contains data about the image associated with the tile and if the tile blocks player movement
TileManager
Loads, stores and draws all tiles
UI
Draws UI information such as score or other messages to the player
